pkgmetadata.longdescription: AGricultural PRoductivity in Space // Functionalities to simulate space-time data and to estimate dynamic-spatial panel data models. Estimators implemented are the BCML (Elhorst (2010), doi:10.1016/j.regsciurbeco.2010.03.003), the MML (Elhorst (2010) doi:10.1016/j.regsciurbeco.2010.03.003) and the INLA Bayesian estimator (Lindgren and Rue, (2015) doi:10.18637/jss.v063.i19; Bivand, Gomez-Rubio and Rue, (2015) doi:10.18637/jss.v063.i20) adapted to panel data. The package contains functions to replicate the analyses of the scientific article entitled "Agricultural Productivity in Space" (Baldoni and Esposti (under revision)).
